text: Thomas Martin Brennan (born October 30, 1952) is a former pitcher in Major League Baseball. He pitched from 1981 to 1985 for the Cleveland Indians, Chicago White Sox and Los Angeles Dodgers. ==External links== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Wausau Timbers players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Lewis Flyers baseball players Category:Oklahoma City 89ers players Category:San Jose Bees players Category:Williamsport Tomahawks players Category:Waterloo Indians players Category:Jersey City Indians players Category:Toledo Mud Hens players Category:Portland Beavers players Category:Tacoma Tugs players Category:Tacoma Tigers players Category:Charleston Charlies players Category:Denver Zephyrs players Category:Albuquerque Dukes players Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:Baseball players from Illinois
title: Tom Brennan (baseball)
